Title: 139: The Rise of Blockchain: A Disruptive Super-Technology Much More Than Bitcoin
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with the Artificial Intelligence Entrepreneur, the one and only, Hadelin de Ponteves. You will hear why learning Blockchain makes perfect sense in this generation right now, the no. 1 reason why Blockchain is so disruptive, and learn valuable insights on real life and innovative applications of Blockchain technology.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/139
